description.value:
Trigger You become @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.Unconscious], dying, or dead while standing.

You fall like a mighty tree, dealing @Damage[7d6[bludgeoning]|options:area-damage] damage to each creature in a @Template[type:line|distance:10] originating from your square with a @Check[reflex|against:class|basic] save against your class DC; on a critical failure, a medium or smaller creature falls @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.Prone] and is @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.Immobilized] until your body is removed.

publication.title: Starfinder Murder in Metal City Deluxe Adventure
